p: Docking experiment is performed using the optimized COVID-19 and SARS (PDB ID: 6NUR, chain A) RdRps by the aid of AutoDock Vina software implemented in SCIGRESS [ 45]. Eight different compounds are tested against Wuhan COVID-19 RdRp, including Sofosbuvir, IDX-184, Ribavirin, Remdisivir, Guanosine triphosphate (GTP), Uracil triphosphate (UTP), Cinnamaldehyde, and Thymoquinone. Sofosbuvir is an approved drug by the Food and Drugs Administration (FDA) against Hepatitis C Virus (HCV) Non-structural protein 5 (NS5B) RdRp in the year 2013 [ 19, [46], [47], [48]]. It gives excellent results against other viruses including the Zika virus [ 16, 17, 49, 50]. IDX-184 was under clinical trials against HCV and gave better results compared to other drugs against HCV, MERS and SARS HCoVs, and Zika virus RdRps (2017, [ 11, 19, 23, [51], [52], [53]]). Ribavirin is a broad-acting antiviral drug used to treat different viruses in combination with immunomodulators or direct-acting antivirals [ [54], [55], [56]]. Remdisivir is a nucleotide analog used to treat Ebola virus, Marburg virus, MERS and SARS infections [ 57]. Cinnamaldehyde and Thymoquinone are negative control compounds that proved its inactivity against RdRp in HCV and Zika virus [ 26].
